dcterms:creator: D. Ackerer
N. Tagasovska
T. Vatter
dcterms:description: This dataset contains the implied volatility surface for S&P500 index options, which is used to analyze and predict the dynamics of implied volatility over time.
dcterms:title: Implied Volatility Surface for S&P500 Index Options

dcterms:creator: R. Cont
J. Da Fonseca
dcterms:description: This dataset provides insights into the dynamics of implied volatility surfaces, focusing on the changes and behaviors of these surfaces over time.
dcterms:title: Implied Volatility Surface Dynamics

dcterms:creator: B. Dumas
J. Fleming
R. E. Whaley
dcterms:description: This dataset includes implied volatility data sourced from OptionMetrics, which is utilized for empirical tests of implied volatility functions.
dcterms:title: Implied Volatility Data from OptionMetrics

dcterms:creator: B. Ning
S. Jaimungal
X. Zhang
M. Bergeron
dcterms:description: This dataset involves the use of variational autoencoders to generate an arbitrage-free implied volatility surface, providing a novel approach to surface generation.
dcterms:title: Variational Autoencoder for Implied Volatility Surface

dcterms:creator: G. Skiadopoulos
S. Hodges
L. Clewlow
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on the principal component analysis of implied volatility surfaces, analyzing the dynamics and variations in the S&P 500 implied volatility surface.
dcterms:title: Principal Component Analysis of Implied Volatility Surfaces
